1.content:
Before we begin the show, why dont we take some time and get to know our players.

Gloria - Ex-CEO, stole millions from her company and now finds herself in a rather different set of surroundings. She's prim, proper and pretty. Beauitful and enchanting in fact. However, that serves no advantage in the maze. Except for the viewers, of course.

Dominique - A thief. Jewel thief to be exact. With her hand caught in the cookie jar, She was sentenced to the maze. She's agile, fit and quite capable. That'll help her out in the game. And a knockout too, that'll help out the viewers.

Not feeling like being a victim?

Then let's look at our stalkers, the people in charge of making sure that these two dont make it through.

Satine - Redheaded dominatrix, a whole leather outfit and attitude to match. She's an expert in bondage and force-feeding and inflation. A real busty idol to match.

Godiva - A powerful warrior. Inflation is her favorite method, with her many tools, but it wont stop her from using any other types of expansion.

Now, play the game.
1.title: Welcome and Choose.

choices: Step On The Ground. "Because You're A Rebel."
11.content:
Beautiful Silky Blond Hair, Shoulder Length. Light Brown Eyes. Normal Nose. Normal Ears. Perfect Smile And Perfect White Teeth. Pink Small Lips. Skinny Short Arms And Small Hands. DD Breast Size. Thin Stomach. Butt Bigger Than Normal Women's Butt. Thin Thighs And Skinny Legs. Small Feet. Not Tanned At All, But Not Pale, Normal White Skin. Five Feet Six Inches Tall. She Has A Soft Sweet Voice Good For Luring. Traits: Beautiful, Intelligent, Luring, But Lacks Physical Strength. Clothes: Custom Fitted Stretchy Black Text-less T-Shirt, Custom Fitted Stretchy Black Shorts With No Waist-Bands.






In The Maze. Your Hair Is Tied Up In A Pony Tail. Behind You Is A Sign Pinned To A 10 Foot Hedge Which Is Part Of The Massive Hedge Wall That Makes The Maze. It Reads "Do NOT Step On The Ground In Front Of This Sign." In Front Of You Are Three Paths. One Straight, One Left And One Straight.
11.title: Gloria

12.content:
Dominque or someone else?

Miranda-Worked as a corporate saboteur, right until a unfortunate encounter sent her to the maze. Maybe she'll get help from some allies she made from the past?

Tori- An arsonist of infamous status, now finally caught for the crimes she committed. Hopefully the maze can survive her.

Sharon-An actually innocent woman sent to the maze for a crime she didn't commit. Will she prove her innocence or will she just blimp up.

Or some other girls?
12.title: Dominique

14.content: Godiva, a very powerful warrior, was getting ready for the maze to begin. "Hmmm. I think I will go after the jewel thief." she said with a devious smile. "She got out a bag filled with stuff for inflation. what shall I use then?"
14.title: Godiva

info.brief_description: On a future game show, you're trapped in a maze with expanding consequences.
info.description:
You have a choice between either two runners or two stalkers in this futuristic maze.

The Maze itself is a complex, multi-level structure with many traps and obstacles. All what lead to expanding you in some way or another. Sometimes beyond your limits.

Ontop of that, you're in there with however many opponents who will try and stop you by any means neccesary.

Good luck.
